title: Grimm Douwa: Hitomi Akiko Sakuhinshuu
original_name: グリム童話 瞳あきこ 作品集
sinopse:
1. Ibarahime: Shigemi no Naka no Kanki (Sleeping Beauty: Delight in the Bushes)
2. Aohige no Danshaku Fujin: Yotsunbai de Aisare te (Is Loved by Women All Four Barons of Bluebeard)
3. Nagagutsu wo Haita Mesu-Neko: Zettai Fukujuu no Chikai (Female Cat Wearing Boots: Oath of Absolute Obedience)
4. V-kei Fuefuki Hamelin: Yuuwaku no Senritsu (Melody of Hamelin Temptation: V System Whistling)
